text: Bijan (also Bizhan or Bejan; Persian : بیژن) is a Persian given name meaning "Hero". This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == People == * Bijan Kumar Shill, a famous scientist, scholar * Bijan Movaghar, second place in Iran as Theoretical physicist, a sun of Mohsen Movaghar == In literature == * Bijan, a character in Bijan and Manijeh, a love story in the Persian epic poem Shahnameh ==References== Category:Given names
title: Bijan
